title: Why did the Star-News run the story Sun. 12-16 about the gun instructor recruiting women to her shooting range after the events last Friday where 20 first graders were massacred by a man with an assault rifle?  It seemed very insensitive.
text:
From Pam Sander, our executive editor:

The timing on the shooting range story could not have been worse.
Unfortunately, the features section of the newspaper where it appeared
prints in advance each week _ on Thursday. We did pull it from the
homepage of our website.
